pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing suspension

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:0.4.eng: The training rule on bad behavior

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā antevāsikā bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.2.eng: At that time the nuns who were the pupils of the nun Thullanandā were socializing and behaving badly, had a bad reputation, and were harassing the Sangha of nuns and hiding each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.3.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.3.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharissanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.4.eng: “How can nuns behave in this way?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.5.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.5.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns are behaving like this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.8.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharissanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.8.eng: “How can nuns behave in this way?

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.10.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.10.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.11.1.pli: “Bhikkhuniyo paneva saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.11.1.eng: ‘If nuns socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses,

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.12.eng: then the nuns should correct them like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.13.pli: ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.13.eng: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.14.eng: Be secluded, Venerables. The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.15.pli: Evañca tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.15.eng: If those nuns still continue as before, the nuns should press them up to three times to make them stop.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.16.pli: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.16.eng: If they then stop, all is well.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.17.pli: no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, imāpi bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:1.17.eng: If they do not stop, then after the third announcement those nuns too have committed an offense entailing sending away and suspension.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.2.eng: what is meant is that they are fully ordained.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.4.pli: saṃsaṭṭhā nāma ananulomikena kāyikavācasikena saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.4.eng: they socialize with improper bodily and verbal action.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.8.eng: a bad reputation has spread about them.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.10.eng: they make a living by means of a bad and wrong livelihood.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.12.eng: they object on each other’s behalf when a legal procedure is being carried out against them.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.18.pli: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.18.eng: other nuns who see it or hear about it. They should correct them like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.19.pli: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.19.eng: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.20.eng: Be secluded, Venerables. The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.21.eng: And they should correct them a second

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.23.eng: If they stop, all is well.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.24.eng: If they do not stop, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.25.eng: If those who hear about it do not say anything, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.26.eng: Those nuns, even if they have to be pulled into the Sangha, should be corrected like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.27.pli: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.27.eng: “Sisters, you socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.28.eng: Be secluded, Venerables. The Sangha praises seclusion for the Sisters.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.29.eng: They should correct them a second

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.31.eng: If they stop, all is well.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.32.eng: If they do not stop, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.34.eng: “And, monks, they should be pressed like this.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.35.eng: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.36.eng: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.37.pli: Itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.37.eng: The nuns so-and-so and so-and-so socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.38.eng: And they keep on doing it.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.39.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuniyo samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.39.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should press them to make them stop.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.41.eng: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.42.pli: Itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.42.eng: The nuns so-and-so and so-and-so socialize, behave badly, have a bad reputation, are notorious, harass the Sangha of nuns, and hide each other’s offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.43.eng: And they keep on doing it.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.44.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuniyo samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.44.eng: The Sangha presses them to make them stop.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.45.pli: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca bhikkhunīnaṃ samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.45.eng: Any nun who approves of pressing the nuns so-and-so and so-and-so to make them stop should remain silent.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.46.eng: Any nun who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.47.eng: For the second time I speak on this matter …

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.48.eng: For the third time I speak on this matter …

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.49.pli: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena, itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca bhikkhuniyo tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.49.eng: The Sangha has pressed the nuns so-and-so and so-and-so to stop.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.50.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.50.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.51.eng: After the motion, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.51.comm: The Pali just says dukkaṭa, without specifying that it is an āpatti, an offense. Yet just below the text says that the dukkaṭa is annulled if you commit the full offense of saṅghādisesa. The implication is that dukkaṭa should be read as āpatti dukkaṭassa, “an offense of wrong conduct”.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.52.eng: After each of the first two announcements, they commit a serious offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.53.eng: When the last announcement is finished, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.54.pli: Saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantīnaṃ ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.54.eng: If they commit the offense entailing suspension, the offense of wrong conduct and the serious offenses are annulled.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.55.pli: Dve tisso ekato samanubhāsitabbā. Tatuttari na samanubhāsitabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.55.eng: Two or three may be pressed together, but not more than that.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.57.eng: this is said with reference to the preceding offenses.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.59.pli: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya āpajjanti, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.59.eng: there is an offense when they have been pressed for the third time, not as soon as the misconduct has been committed.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.61.eng: they are sent away from the Sangha.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.1.63.eng: … Therefore, too, it is called an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.1.pli: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.1.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.2.pli: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.2.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.3.pli: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.3.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they perceive it as illegitimate, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.4.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but they perceive it as legitimate, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.5.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.2.6.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.2.eng: if they have not been pressed;

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.5.eng: if they are the first offenders.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss12:2.3.6.eng: The twelfth offense entailing suspension is finished.
